title: watch the sunrise digital art
content:
i tryed to realize some words and toughts that were at my mind. love, passion and all that is part of me and who I am.

trying to express my self and to ease a little (i love someone that is not so close to me).

thanks for your critique.

p.s maybe it is too thin (but jpeg destroyed smoothness. and the text looked better in .ai file :). )

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sunrise.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419055323/http:/typophile.com/files/sunrise.jpg) | 146.26 KB |
author: garden

comments.content: Have you tried exporting it as a .PNG? It might for better for your type.

I say blur the edges of the colored section way out. I am assuming it is a layer, so it should be easy. It is horizontal, I imagine like the horizon. One part is dark, but the closer the eye gets to the sun the more colorful it gets.
